title: The Smithsonian
description: The Smithsonian Institution in Washington, D.C., is a renowned and prestigious complex of museums, research institutions, and galleries, collectively offering a captivating journey through the art, history, science, and culture of the United States and the world. As a centerpiece of the nation's capital, the Smithsonian is a treasure trove of knowledge, providing a vibrant tapestry of experiences for visitors of all ages and interests. Home to numerous museums and galleries, each with its own distinct focus, the Smithsonian showcasesan extensive and diverse collection of artifacts, artworks, and exhibits. From the iconic National Air and Space Museum, where the dreams of flight and space exploration take flight, to the National Museum of American History, which celebrates the nation's heritage, the Smithsonian offers a rich tapestry of American culture and history. But the Smithsonian is not limited to American history alone. It hosts a wide spectrum of international exhibits and collections, encompassing everything from natural history at the National Museum of Natural History to art and culture at the National Museum of African Art. The institution's commitment to inclusivity ensures that all visitors have an enriching and accessible experience, with services for those with disabilities and an array of educational programs for learners of all ages.

services.title: Educational Programs
services.intro: Engage in a world of discovery and learning through our educational programs at the Smithsonian museums. Our offerings are designed to spark curiosity and inspire lifelong learning. Here are examples of our educational programs and services:
lists: Workshops and Classes: Interactive workshops and classes for learners of all ages, covering a variety of topics, from art to science.
Lectures and Talks: Engage with experts and scholars through lectures, talks, and panel discussions on diverse subjects related to our collections and research.
Family Programs: Designed for families, these programs encourage exploration and interaction, often with a focus on art, history, and science.
Youth and Teen Programs: Specialized programs that cater to the interests and needs of young learners, offering opportunities for creativity and exploration.

services.title: Accessibility Services
services.intro: Ensuring an inclusive and welcoming experience for all, our accessibility services at the Smithsonian museums cater to the diverse needs of our visitors. Examples of these services include:
lists: Wheelchair Accessibility: Accessible entrances, ramps, and elevators for visitors with mobility challenges.
Sign Language Interpreters: For guests who are deaf or hard of hearing, sign language interpreters can be arranged for tours and presentations.
Assistive Listening Devices: Devices for amplifying sound in auditoriums and galleries, benefiting visitors with hearing impairments.
Braille and Large Print Materials: Braille signage, tactile maps, and large print materials to aid visitors with visual impairments.

packages.title: Smithsonian Walk Through Tour
packages.text: Immerse yourself in a world of knowledge and wonder at the Smithsonian. With a diverse range of museums and exhibitions, the Smithsonian offers a captivating journey through art, history, science, and culture. Join us for an enriching experience at one of the world's most renowned cultural institutions.

packages.title: Interactive Displays Tour
packages.text: Immerse yourself in the Smithsonian's world of interactive displays, where history, science, and culture come to life at your fingertips. Engage with dynamic touchscreen exhibits, hands-on learning experiences, and cutting-edge technology that make exploring our collections a truly immersive adventure for all ages.

packages.title: Artifact Exploration
packages.text: Dive into the treasures of history, science, and art as you discover the stories behind remarkable artifacts from around the world. Each item in our collection is a window into the past, offering a profound connection to the human experience. Unearth the mysteries, innovations, and inspirations that have shaped our world, one artifact at a time.

packages.title: Self Guided Museum Tour
packages.text: Experience the Smithsonian at your own pace with our self-guided tour. Navigate the treasures of our world-class museums on your terms, following your interests and curiosity. Delve into the diverse exhibits, iconic artifacts, and fascinating stories that await around every corner. Your adventure begins here, as you chart your unique course through the Smithsonian's rich tapestry of knowledge, culture, and history.

packages.title: National Air and Space Museum Tour
packages.text: Step into the boundless world of aviation and space exploration at the National Air and Space Museum. Home to the wonders of flight and the mysteries of the cosmos, our museum invites you to touch the stars. Discover the stories that soar, from the first flight to the first steps on the moon, all under one roof.

packages.title: The American Art Museum Tour
packages.text: Discover the vibrant tapestry of American creativity at the Smithsonian American Art Museum. Our galleries house a diverse collection of artworks, spanning centuries and reflecting the rich tapestry of American culture. Join us on a visual journey through the evolving story of American art, where every canvas and sculpture offers a unique perspective on the American experience.
